title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 17.10 - Plate reissuance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 17.10 - Plate reissuance

State Regulations
(a) Upon the request of an applicant for
passenger and commercial registrations, and payment of a one-time fee, not to
exceed $20, the department shall provide a number plate or plates bearing the
same distinctive numerals and/or letters as the number plate being replaced
through plate reissuance. Such one-time fee shall be in addition to the regular
registration fee and reflectorized plate fee prescribed by Vehicle and Traffic

Law, section 401. O nce reissued plates are received, the $20 fee will be
non-refundable. If reissued plates are lost in transit and have not been
returned to the department as undeliverable, the customer may apply to the
department for a refund of the $20 fee and will be issued a new plate or plates
with new numbers at no charge. Such fee shall not be charged for any special or
distinctive design number plate, for which an annual service charge is paid in
addition to the regular registration fee prescribed by Vehicle and Traffic Law, section 401. (b) If reissued plates
are lost in transit and have not been returned as undeliverable, the customer
may not have the original plate remade. If reissued plates are returned to the
department and recorded as undeliverable, the department will reissue them to
the customer. (c) If both reissued
plates are lost, stolen, mutilated or destroyed, the department will not
reissue the same plate number. (d) If one reissued plate is lost, stolen, mutilated or destroyed, the department
will replace the plate upon payment of the transaction and plate fee. If the
plate is stolen and a police report is submitted, no fee will be
charged. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
17.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
